rules_text:
When you cast Gruvak, God of Horns, search your library for up to two Minotaur creature cards with different names, and put them onto the battlefield.
[i]Skullkeeping[/i] – Whenever one or more creatures you control attack a player, you may exile a card from your graveyard and put a skull counter on it. If you do, the defending player discards a card.
